briefdescription.para: Unified WiFi base class for all WiFi implementations.

detaileddescription.para: This file contains the declaration of the BaseWifi abstract class, which provides a comprehensive WiFi abstraction that serves as the base for all WiFi implementations in the HardFOC system. It supports station and access point modes, security configurations, connection management, and works across different hardware platforms including ESP32, and other WiFi-capable MCUs.

simplesect.para: This class is not thread-safe. Use appropriate synchronization if accessed from multiple contexts.
